title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Extraction and purification of genomic and Plasmic DNA. Restriction enzyme digestion of DNA and analysis by agarose gel electrophoresis. Elution of DNA from agarose gel. Labelling of DNA, Southern blotting. Extraction and analysis of total RNA.. Preparation and transformation of competent cells. Identification of recombinant clones. Polymerase chain reaction, DNA Sequencing,
